mapper.insert: INSERT INTO delivery (recive, pscode, address_road, address_detail, phonenum, request, user_id) VALUES (#{recive}, #{pscode}, #{address_road}, #{address_detail}, #{phonenum}, #{request}, #{user_id});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM delivery WHERE address_id = #{address_id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE delivery SET recive = #{recive}, pscode = #{pscode}, address_road = #{address_road}, address_detail = #{address_detail}, phonenum = #{phonenum}, request = #{request} WHERE address_id = #{address_id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM delivery WHERE address_id = #{address_id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
